data.meta_description: Friends star Matthew Perry has battled addiction, a scrapped engagement and an alleged dating app humiliation - but always helping him through the darkest times is his "best friend" Courteney Cox
data.text:
Matthew Perry is so funny the Friends writers let him improvise some of Chandler Bing's best one-liners and sarcastic quips.

But as is the case with so many comedy geniuses, behind his smile hides decades of pain..

Now sober, Matthew, 52, is refreshingly honest about having overcome his demons and he has dedicated huge amounts of time to helping other addicts.

It all started in 1997, when Matthew got hooked on prescription pill Vicodin after a jet-ski accident.

That same year he headed to rehab for the first time, staying there for 28 days.
